intro.heading: Protecting Your Personal Information
intro.content: At FinanceTracker, your privacy is our priority. We are committed to safeguarding your personal and financial information while ensuring transparency in how your data is collected, used, and stored. Our platform only collects information necessary to provide and enhance our financial tracking services. This may include your name, email address, and financial data, which are securely processed in compliance with relevant privacy laws. FinanceTracker does not share your data with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data and provide you with full control over your account, allowing you to update or delete your information at any time. By using FinanceTracker, you agree to this privacy policy and our dedication to keeping your information safe.

privacyPractices.title: Information Collection
privacyPractices.description: We collect personal information when you register, use our services, or interact with us.

privacyPractices.title: Data Usage
privacyPractices.description: Your information is used to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and personalize your experience.

privacyPractices.title: Data Security
privacyPractices.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.

userRights.heading: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time.

callToAction.heading: Questions or Concerns?
callToAction.content: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us.
